The news came at a press conference where Edwards announced the healthcare system in New Orleans could be overwhelmed in seven to 10 days in a worst-case scenario.

The move comes three days after state education leaders requested the waivers. Something they said was needed to â€œallow educators to move forward and focus their attention on keeping students and teachers healthy and safe.â€

Local school leaders said the changes would promote student mental health and well-being by easing the burden of grades, attendance and schoolwork and also allow schools to adapt their online learning as things change rapidly. Some of the waivers require approval from the U.S. Department of Education.

Students drank tea and ate cookies at a "tea party" and then read monologues written from the perspective of different colonists- Loyalists, Patriots, and in-between. They studied this part of history through the IB central idea, "Conflict occurs when different needs, desires, and personal ideologies exist in a society."
